title: 103_hr2351
content: The Act titled "Arts, Humanities, and Museums Amendments of 1993" makes amendments to the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965. The Arts, Humanities, and Museums Amendments of 1993 modify the limitation on the use of federal funds under the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965. The amendment restricts the amount allotted to a State for the current fiscal year to not exceed the amount allotted for the preceding fiscal year if certain conditions are met. The Arts, Humanities, and Museums Amendments of 1993 amend the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by limiting the use of federal funds. The amendment specifies conditions for State fund reductions and the allotment of remaining funds to other States. The Arts, Humanities, and Museums Amendments of 1993 amend the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by specifying the allocation of federal funds for fiscal years 1994 and 1995. This includes earmarking specific percentages for certain activities outlined in the amendment. The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to allocate federal funds for fiscal years 1994 and 1995, with specific amounts designated for certain activities. The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to allocate federal funds for fiscal years 1994 and 1995, with specific amounts designated for certain activities. Amendments include changing funding amounts for fiscal year 1994 to $11,963,000 and adjusting funding for fiscal year 1995 as necessary. The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to allocate federal funds for fiscal years 1994 and 1995, with specific amounts designated for certain activities. Amendments include adjusting funding amounts for fiscal year 1994 to $14,228,000 and making necessary adjustments for fiscal year 1995. The Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to allocate funds for fiscal years 1994 and 1995, with specific amounts designated for certain activities. The total appropriations authorized are limited to $174,593,000 for fiscal year 1994. The National Endowment for the Arts is required to investigate State compliance with a specific section of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 and submit a report with findings and recommendations by September 30, 1995. The total appropriations authorized for fiscal year 1994 are limited to $177,491,000. The Museum Services Act is amended to increase funding to $28,777,000 for fiscal year 1994 and provide necessary sums for fiscal year 1995. The amendment also changes the year in subsection (d) from 1993 to 1995.
